commit message:
Fix for NPE when Recipients is empty for thread.

// FREEBIE

make ComposeText extend AppCompatEditText

Fixes https://github.com/WhisperSystems/TextSecure/issues/3134
Closes https://github.com/WhisperSystems/TextSecure/pull/3160

Fixes #125

// FREEBIE

remove 'Media message:' prefix from MMS notification notification

Fixes https://github.com/WhisperSystems/TextSecure/issues/2928
Closes https://github.com/WhisperSystems/TextSecure/pull/3152

// FREEBIE

refactor emoji code into package

1) EmojiTextView and EmojiEditText are used instead of
using code to emojify text.

2) Emoji categories' code points are specified in XML

3) EmojiDrawer itself is a fragment, and its pages are
also fragments, allowing for better memory
management.

Fixes https://github.com/WhisperSystems/TextSecure/issues/2938
Fixes https://github.com/WhisperSystems/TextSecure/issues/2936
Closes https://github.com/WhisperSystems/TextSecure/pull/3153

// FREEBIE

finish ConversationActivity on delete of empty thread

Fixes https://github.com/WhisperSystems/TextSecure/issues/3086
Closes https://github.com/WhisperSystems/TextSecure/pull/3124

// FREEBIE

fix recent emoji pane

1) Make recent list properly update and invalidate.
2) Show most-recently-used first.
3) Refactoring

Closes https://github.com/WhisperSystems/TextSecure/pull/3171
// FREEBIE
new emoji arrays

new emoji category layout

Fixes https://github.com/WhisperSystems/TextSecure/issues/2962
Fixes https://github.com/WhisperSystems/TextSecure/issues/2954

Refactor ContactSelectionListAdapter and associated views.

// FREEBIE

Fix for media thumbnails flickering on model updates.

Only update ImageView contents when they have changed.

Fixes https://github.com/WhisperSystems/TextSecure/issues/1004
Fixes https://github.com/WhisperSystems/TextSecure/issues/2663
Closes https://github.com/WhisperSystems/TextSecure/pull/3184

// FREEBIE

Fix image cache bugs.

1) Index SlideDeckListener cache by MMS (id, timestamp) tuple.

2) Index parts by (id, content_id) tuples.

Fixes https://github.com/WhisperSystems/TextSecure/issues/840
Closes https://github.com/WhisperSystems/TextSecure/pull/3183
// FREEBIE

Support for direct photo capture from app.

Make the send button toggle to an attach button when the
compose text and attachments are emmpty.

Part of https://github.com/WhisperSystems/TextSecure/issue/520
Closes https://github.com/WhisperSystems/TextSecure/pull/3186

Fixes #64

new attach icon

fancier interpolation

remove unnecessary 'Add Attachment' title

Bottom align the emoji toggle and send toggle.

Closes https://github.com/WhisperSystems/TextSecure/pull/2627

Fixes #73
Avoid redeclaration of proguard files

move all packagingOptions exclusions into a single closure

// FREEBIE

don't show recent emoji if empty

Fixes https://github.com/WhisperSystems/TextSecure/issues/3201
Closes https://github.com/WhisperSystems/TextSecure/pull/3209
// FREEBIE

Add vertical spacing to emoji sprites

Downsampling on low-dpi devices led to 1px bleeds between
sprite areas.

Fixes https://github.com/WhisperSystems/TextSecure/issues/3203
Closes https://github.com/WhisperSystems/TextSecure/pull/3206
// FREEBIE

Fix context leak from lingering RecipientModifiedListener.

Because ContactSelectionListItem is used as a
RecipientModifiedListener, it leaks its context
(NewConversationActivity/PushContactSelectionActivity),
which can lead to OOM crashes.

Closes https://github.com/WhisperSystems/TextSecure/pull/3214
// FREEBIE

Fix for toggle behavior during rapid clear/fill cycles.

Fixes https://github.com/WhisperSystems/TextSecure/issues/3235
Closes https://github.com/WhisperSystems/TextSecure/pull/3239
// FREEBIE

Fix flickering emoji and periodic emoji vanishings

Fixes https://github.com/WhisperSystems/TextSecure/issues/3231
Closes https://github.com/WhisperSystems/TextSecure/pull/3233
// FREEBIE

prevent early callback death

android is so dumb.
